string.name: parent
string.value: In Search of the Book of Ancient
I found an anonymous grave somewhere deep in the valley of the snowfield. I also removed an old ring from the corpse's finger. Maybe Alcaster knows what to do with it.

string.name: summary
string.value: I should take the ring I found at the grave and take it to Alcaster in El Nath.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: 2,000 EXP Can proceed to the "The Secrets Behind the Ring?" quest.
Dug up the small tomb, and found a shining object on the finger of a corpse. Will you stretch your arm out and take the item from it?
The item taken from the finger of a corpse is an #b#t4031053##k that seems to have been around for a long time.
In the tomb there was some moss, a corpse, and not much else. Looked further in but still found nothing.
When you carefully examine the small dug up grave, you notice that a shiny ring has been placed on the skeleton's finger again. Will you put your hands inside to remove the ring?
